summary: Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII.
cast: Keri Russell|Skeet Ulrich|Mare Winningham|Tania Gunadi|Gwendoline Yeo|Stephen Strachan|Katie Keating|Ken Pogue|Eric Winter|Jane McGregor|Daryl Shuttleworth|Brayden Bullen|Sam Dyer|Mary Black|Jacqueline Robbins|Joyce Robbins|Karl Roth|Andy Maton|Roger Haskett|Kira Bradley|Tom Carey|Skyler Banman|Madison Lindstrom
title: The Magic of Ordinary Days
